variables.label: General | Version
variables.description: Check out their valid tags at https://hub.docker.com/r/gotenberg/gotenberg/tags

variables.label: General | Graceful Shutdown Duration
variables.description: Graceful shutdown duration.

variables.label: API | Port
variables.description: Port of Gotenberg.

variables.label: API | Timeout
variables.description: Time limit for requests.

variables.label: API | Root Path
variables.description: Root path of the API for service discovery via URL paths.

variables.label: API | Trace Header
variables.description: Header name to use for identifying requests.

variables.label: API | Disable Health Check
variables.description: Whether to disable health check logging.

variables.label: Chromium | Allow File Access From Files
variables.description: Whether to allow `file://` URIs to read other `file://` URIs.

variables.label: Chromium | Allow Insecure Localhost
variables.description: Whether to ignore TLS/SSL errors on `localhost`.

variables.label: Chromium | Allow List
variables.description: Allowed URLs for Chromium using a regular expression.

variables.label: Chromium | Deny List
variables.description: Denied URLs for Chromium using a regular expression.

variables.label: Chromium | Ignore Certificate Errors
variables.description: Whether to ignore certificate errors.

variables.label: Chromium | Disable Web Security
variables.description: Whether to not enforce the same-origin policy.

variables.label: Chromium | Incognito Mode
variables.description: Whether to start Chromium with incognito mode.

variables.label: Chromium | Host Resolver Rules
variables.description: Custom mappings to the host resolver.

variables.label: Chromium | Proxy Server
variables.description: Outbound proxy server. This switch only affects HTTP and HTTPS requests.

variables.label: Chromium | Disable JavaScript
variables.description: Whether to disable JavaScript.

variables.label: Chromium | Disable Routes
variables.description: Whether to disable the routes for Chromium.

variables.label: LibreOffice | Disable Routes
variables.description: Whether to disable the routes for LibreOffice.

variables.label: LibreOffice | Listener Start Timeout
variables.description: Time limit for starting the LibreOffice listener.

variables.label: LibreOffice | Listener Restart Threshold
variables.description: Conversions limit after which the LibreOffice listener is restarted. `0` means no long-running LibreOffice listener.

variables.label: PDF Engines | Engines
variables.description: PDF engines and their order (e.g. `pdftk,uno-pdfengine`). Leave blank to use all.

variables.label: PDF Engines | Disable Routes
variables.description: Whether to disable the routes for PDF Engines.

variables.label: Webhook | Allow List
variables.description: Allowed URLs for the webhook feature using a regular expression.

variables.label: Webhook | Deny List
variables.description: Denied URLs for the webhook feature using a regular expression.

variables.label: Webhook | Error Allow List
variables.description: Allowed URLs in case of an error for the webhook feature using a regular expression.

variables.label: Webhook | Error Deny List
variables.description: Denied URLs in case of an error for the webhook feature using a regular expression.

variables.label: Webhook | Maximum Retry
variables.description: Maximum number of retries for the webhook feature.

variables.label: Webhook | Minimum Retry Waiting Time
variables.description: Minimum duration to wait before trying to call the webhook again.

variables.label: Webhook | Maximum Retry Waiting Time
variables.description: Maximum duration to wait before trying to call the webhook again.

variables.label: Webhook | Client Timeout
variables.description: Time limit for requests to the webhook.

variables.label: Webhook | Disable
variables.description: Whether to disable the webhook feature.

variables.label: Prometheus | Collect Interval
variables.description: Interval for collecting modules' metrics.

variables.label: Prometheus | Namespace
variables.description: Namespace of modules' metrics.

variables.label: Prometheus | Disable Collect
variables.description: Whether to disable the collect of metrics.

variables.label: Prometheus | Disable Route Logging
variables.description: Whether to disable the route logging.

variables.label: Logging | Format
variables.description: Log format (`auto`, `json` or `text`)

variables.label: Logging | Level
variables.description: Log level (`error`, `warn`, `info` or `debug`)

instructions.start: Gotenberg provides a developer-friendly API to interact with powerful tools like Chromium and LibreOffice for converting numerous document formats (HTML, Markdown, Word, Excel, etc.) into PDF files, and more!
instructions.end:
Gotenberg has been successfully deployed! It might take few moments before it's fully started.
You can access it at `http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain`
If you prefer not to expose it, you can change it in the **HTTP Settings** of `$$cap_appname`.

description: Docker-Powered Stateless API For PDF Files
